rolePermissions.title: Role Permissions
rolePermissions.description: Customize permissions for each role in your venue
rolePermissions.noAccessDesc: You don't have permission to manage role permissions. Contact your administrator.
rolePermissions.infoAlert: Changes to role permissions will affect all users with that role. Individual staff members can have custom permissions in Team Management.
rolePermissions.selectRoleDesc: Choose a role to customize permissions

rolePermissions.defaultPermissionsDesc: Using default permissions for this role
rolePermissions.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes that will be lost if you continue. Do you want to discard these changes?
rolePermissions.wildcardActive: This role has wildcard permissions (*:*) granting full access to all features.

rolePermissions.legendCritical: Critical permission (cannot be removed from own role)
rolePermissions.updateSuccessDesc: Permissions for {{role}} have been successfully updated.
rolePermissions.updateError: Failed to update permissions. Please try again.
rolePermissions.revertSuccessDesc: Permissions for {{role}} have been reverted to defaults.
rolePermissions.revertError: Failed to revert permissions. Please try again.
rolePermissions.confirmRevertMessage: This will restore the default permissions for this role and remove any customizations. This action cannot be undone.

roleDisplayNames.infoAlert: Customize how role names appear in your venue. This only affects the display name, not the actual permissions.
roleDisplayNames.noChangesDesc: There are no changes to save.
roleDisplayNames.saveSuccessDesc: Role display names have been updated.
roleDisplayNames.resetSuccessDesc: All role names have been reset to defaults.
